attributes.action: Remove Toby Young from appointment to the newly created Office for Students
attributes.background: Due to the abusive comments made by Mr Young on social media in relation to disabled students access to education, he is not a fit and proper person to be appointed to this role.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments.

If you're concerned about the process for appointments to the Board of the Office for Students, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/208774
